mapper.insert: insert into reservationlist values( reservationlist_idx.nextval, 'test', #{aim}, #{startspot}, #{endspot}, #{route}, 'test', 'test', 'test', TO_date(#{starttime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{mannum}, #{gender}, 0, #{smoking}, #{pluscontent}, sysdate, 'test', 'test', sysdate, sysdate, 'test', '서울')
